title: Social credit system
body: Hi, I created something that could be a base system. Anyone willing to review my code?

title: IOTA
body: Dear, the proof of work used by IOTA is minimal compared to Bitcoin ...

title: Blockchain is marvellous
body: Read my lips: no one is going away with a lie in the future or he/she will be excluded from certain environments.

title: The cat has lost a leg
body: OMG. She ran under a car and we had to go to the vet with her, who amputed her leg.

title: Firebase
body: Anyone has an idea how to do authenticate?

title: Meal vouchers
body: Dear, this month I wasn't able yet to use them. Kind regards, Nico.

title: I really need a new car
body: Dear Christophe, my car is too slow and too small. I'm looking forward to order a Mercedes S63 style car. Or a Tesla P100D. Best regards, Nico.

title: A real game changer
body: All, if we just could add a learning factor to game theory, then it would be fine. Kind regards, Nico.

title: Who's that famous Satoshi Nakamoto?
body: I have no idea who he is, did he let us a clou? Anyone has an idea?

title: IMF
body: Andrea, there should be something we can do to tackle bitcoin and its alternatives. Kind regards, Nico.

title: BIB Basel
body: All, we need to do something ...
